content.rendered:
Directed by Anne Walker Farrell. Meg Waldow. Cal Ramsey. Gina Gress.

Written by Charlie Grandy. Charlie Grandy. Akshara Sekar. Akshara Sekar. Elijah Aron. Stephanie Amante-Ritter. Joseph Barbera. William Hanna. Matt Warburton. Stephanie M. Johnson. Jenna Michelle Simmons.

Cast Glenn Howerton (Fred 1). Sam Richardson (Norville / … 1). Constance Wu (Daphne 1). Jane Lynch (Donna 1). Melissa Fumero (Sophie). Russell Peters (Aman). Wanda Sykes (Linda). Fortune Feimster (Olive). Yvonne Orji (Gigi). Sarayu Blue (Diya). Nicole Byer (Blythe). Gary Cole (Lamont). Kari Wahlgren (Evelyn). Frank Welker (William). Andrew Morgado (Fro Yo). Cherry Jones (Victoria). Ken Leung (Darren). Jim Rash (Mayor Dave). Debby Ryan (Krista). Stephen Root (Chief Cogburn). Karl-Anthony Towns (Handsome Jock). ‘Weird Al’ Yankovic (Dandruff Tuba). Shay Mitchell (Brenda). Kulap Vilaysack (Lola). min/Epg-Na Wen (Carroll). Tiana Camacho (Kimmy). Natalia del Riego (Becca). Themo Melikidze (Skinhead). James Adomian (Thespian). Gary Anthony Williams (Private Eye). Kimberly Brooks (Cool Edgy Girl). Dimitry Rozental (Russian Soldier). Piotr Michael (Casey Kasem). Roger Craig Smith (Stoner). Chris Schleicher (Male Nurse). Akshara Sekar (Influencer)

Language English.

Producers Stephanie Amante-Ritter. Elijah Aron. Charlie Grandy. min/Epdy Kaling. Howard Klein. Hye-Yun Park. Sam Register. Jessica Kumai Scott. Matt Warburton. Rick Williams. Amy Winfrey. Kandace Reuter.

Production Charlie Grandy Productions. Kaling International. 3 Arts Entertainment.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status OnGoing (2023–)
